#summary This wiki describe the Gene dataset on the Desktop Tool

= Gene =

The figure shows [SearchTab Search Tab] using the Gene as main dataset. 

http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/26.jpg

In this dataset the quick search will be performed over the *!GeneId*, *Symbol* 
and !LocusTag fields including the use of simple regular expressions 
too. Also, Description and Synonym fields are available for search. 

On this !DataSet you are able to use other biological objects as [Constrains Constrains].
The available !DataSet to be used as constrains are: Taxonomy,
Ontology, Protein and KEGG Gene.

The [SearchTab Search Tab] will produce a new [ListTab List Tab], next figure, 
with the obtained results.

http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/27.jpg

The Gene complete description window

http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/28.jpg

If the !ComboBox shows the *Protein* option the table will show the proteins 
linked with this gene. Click on the protein's name will open the [ProteinDT Protein]
Tab.

http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/29.jpg
